His current board and investment experience includes Fortis Life Sciences, Hallmark Health Care Solutions, Paradigm Outcomes, Sound Physicians, TurningPoint Healthcare Solutions, U.S. Renal Care and VaxCare. Ross' prior investments and directorships include Abode Healthcare (acquired by BrightSpring Health Services), DMG Practice Management Solutions (acquired by Ares Management), My Dentist (acquired by Heartland Dental) and PharmScript (Acquired by OptumRx). Previously, Ross worked at the Center for Medicare and Medicaid Innovation and in Cowen and Company’s Health Care Investment Banking Group, where he focused on M&A transactions as well as public and private offerings. Ross holds a BA in economics and history from Bowdoin College and an MBA from the Wharton School at the University of Pennsylvania.

Name: Austin L. Stradling
Title: Associate
Bio: Austin focuses primarily on the technology sector. His investment experience includes Netgain. Prior to Summit, Austin worked in the Technology Investment Banking Group at Evercore. Previously, he worked at Sorenson Capital Partners and Menlo Ventures. Austin holds a BS in finance from Brigham Young University.

Name: Tim Strickland
Title: Advisory Partner
Bio: As an Advisory Partner, Tim works closely with Summit’s investment team to identify new investment opportunities and collaborate with portfolio company leaders to help shape growth strategies focused on long-term value creation. Tim is a seasoned technology executive with deep experience leading high-performing revenue, enterprise sales, customer success and business development teams. He joins Summit from ZoomInfo (NASDAQ: ZI), a global leader in go-to-market intelligence solutions, where he served as Chief Revenue Officer and in other sales leadership roles as the company grew from $144 million to more than $1 billion in revenues. During his tenure at ZoomInfo, Tim helped build the customer growth and strategic sales organizations and led go-to-market functions through to the company’s IPO in 2020. Prior to ZoomInfo, Tim held customer success and sales leadership roles at Marketo, where he was part of the leadership team that led the publicly traded company through a take-private acquisition in 2016 and its subsequent acquisition by Adobe in 2018. Tim began his software career at Extole, where he helped lead the company’s business development efforts. Tim holds an AB in history from Princeton University. ‍ ‍ ‍ ‍ Advisory Partners are a group of persons employed and/or retained by Summit or any of its affiliates (and include both Summit and/or portfolio company employees and individuals not employed by Summit or any portfolio company) to provide certain functional and other services to Summit, the Summit funds and their portfolio companies. Advisory Partners are expected to receive expense reimbursements and compensation (including salary, retainer, fees, incentive equity, stock awards or other profits interests) from Summit, portfolio companies, prospective portfolio companies and/or directly from the fund, and are permitted to receive carried interest in one or more Summit funds. Such compensation will be in addition to, and will not result in offsets to or reductions of, the management fee paid to Summit by the fund. Advisory Partners are expected to work closely with Summit on various functional matters including, not limited to, business development activities, collaborate with investment teams to identify new investment opportunities, team with portfolio company leaders to help shape growth strategies focused on long-term value creation, or hold board seats at portfolio companies. ‍

Name: Cathy Tanimura
Title: Principal, Data Science
Bio: Cathy works closely with the Summit team and our portfolio companies to help create and execute strategies that effectively use data and analytics to drive better decisions and build better products. Prior to Summit, Cathy worked at Strava, where she built an analytics and data science team focused on product, marketing and business development. Previously, she led analytics teams at Okta and Zynga. Cathy holds an AB in economics from Princeton University and an MBA from the University of San Francisco.

Name: Thomas M. Tarnowski
Title: Managing Director
Bio: Thomas joined Summit Partners in 2013, and focuses primarily on the healthcare & life sciences sector in Europe. His board and investment experience includes Advance Medical (acquired by Teladoc), CluePoints, DentalPro (acquired by BC Partners), Independent Vetcare (acquired by EQT), RadioOnkologieNetzwerk (acquired by Medipass), Viroclinics Biosciences (acquired by Cerba Healthcare) and zahneins (acquired by PAI Partners). Prior to Summit, Thomas worked for Triton, where he led the Nordic healthcare team with a focus on healthcare services and medical technology investments. Before that, he worked for Credit Suisse First Boston and Citigroup. Thomas received an MBA from Harvard Business School and a BBA in finance from Valdosta State University. He is a Danish national and speaks Danish, English, Norwegian, Polish and Swedish.

Name: Kai Terada-Herzer
Title: Associate
Bio: Kai joined Summit Partners in 2021 and currently focuses on managing the firm's credit positions. He holds a BA in economics from Amherst College. While at Amherst, Kai played varsity baseball and was voted captain of the team.

Name: Paul-Hugo Thiboult
Title: Senior Associate
Bio: Paul-Hugo is a Senior Associate on the Growth Products & Services team. His investment experience includes CERTANIA, Doctrine and One Point Advisory Services. Prior to Summit, Paul-Hugo worked as a private equity investor at 3i in London and co-founded his own venture. Paul-Hugo holds a BBA from IE Business School and an MSc, with distinction, from the London School of Economics. He is a French national and speaks English and French.

Name: Griffin Tutun
Title: Associate
Bio: Griffin is an Associate on the Growth Products & Services team. Prior to Summit, Griffin worked at Veritas Capital on the Credit Opportunities team. Previously, he held investment banking analyst roles at UBS Investment Bank in the Financial Sponsors & Leveraged Finance Group as well as at Truist Securities in the Technology, Media & Telecommunications Group. Griffin holds a BA in History from Cornell University.

Name: Hitha Uday
Title: Associate
Bio: Hitha focuses primarily on the healthcare & life sciences sector. Prior to Summit, Hitha worked in Healthcare Investment Banking at Harris Williams Hitha holds a BA in economics as well as medicine, health and society with a minor in business and Asian studies from Vanderbilt University.

Name: Marc J. Vangerven
Title: Associate
Bio: Marc focuses primarily on the healthcare & life sciences sector in Europe. Prior to Summit, Marc worked in the Healthcare Investment Banking Group at Lazard. Marc holds a Bsc in biochemistry from University College London. He is a dual Belgian & American national and speaks Dutch & English.

Name: Stefan Vehr
Title: Vice President, Office of the CFO
Bio: Stefan is a member of Summit’s Peak Performance Group and works with management teams to help identify and execute growth strategies that build long-term value. Most frequently, he collaborates with portfolio company CFOs to help them effectively scale their teams, processes and technology. Prior to Summit, Stefan served in financial leadership roles at Litera, a legal technology business, and Syntellis Performance Solutions, an enterprise performance management (EPM) software and data business. He spent the first decade of his career working for publicly traded technology companies including CDW, Nuance Communications, and Microsoft. Stefan holds a BBA in finance from the University of Massachusetts Amherst and an MBA from Boston University.

Name: Alex Vollmer
Title: Director of Engineering
Bio: Alex serves as an architect and senior software developerwithin Summit’s internal software team. Alex brings more than 27 years of professional software development and management experience in a wide range of industries, platforms and technologies. Prior to Summit, Alex ran his own independent software consultancy. Previously, he worked as a lead software engineer at a variety of high growth companies including:  Z2live, EVRI.com, Wetpaint, OnAir, LogiCalis and VoiceStream (T-Mobile).

Name: Aaron C. White
Title: Vice President, Capital Markets
Bio: Aaron is a member of Summit’s Capital Markets team, where he works on the firm’s capital markets activities, both for existing portfolio companies and for new acquisitions. In addition, he helps Summit manage its commercial and investment banking relationships. Prior to Summit, Aaron worked in the Leveraged Finance Group at Deutsche Bank. Aaron holds a BS in finance from The Pennsylvania State University.

Name: Erin White
Title: Chief Compliance Officer
Bio: Erin joined Summit Partners in 2010. Prior to Summit, she worked for Bain Capital and Deloitte. Based in Summit’s Boston office, Erin is the firm’s Chief Compliance Officer. She holds a BA in economics and an MBA from Boston College. She is also a CFA charterholder.

Name: Alysha Zimmermann
Title: Associate
Bio: Alysha focuses primarily on the technology sector in Europe. Prior to Summit, Alysha worked for Macquarie Capital in Sydney, Australia, in the technology investing team. Previously, she worked in the Investment Banking Division at Goldman Sachs covering consumer, retail and TMT. Alysha holds a Bachelor of Laws and Commerce, with first class honors, from the University of Queensland, Australia. She is a Swiss, Australian and New Zealand citizen. ‍
